content:
@mw do you know whether the instructions here are correct for AppleClang?

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/e562b24ae325f5a31b7ba5873e3db426a14e6342/src/doc/rustc/src/linker-plugin-lto.md#cc-code-as-a-dependency-in-rust
I'm not sure whether this has been tested with AppleClang. I think FF uses a clang from homebrew in order to make sure that versions match.
